Class ItemRecyclerAdapter

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ItemRecyclerAdapter.ViewHolder>
com.example.boeing301house.itemlist.ItemRecyclerAdapter
public class ItemRecyclerAdapter extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ItemRecyclerAdapter.ViewHolder>
Adapter object for items in recycler view ... layout manager = linear layout manager; orientation = vertical
